code: import{ADToBS}from"components/React/Datepicker/Datepickerutils";export default function formatDate(date){if(date){var dateVal=date?new Date(date):new Date();var day=dateVal.getDate();var month=dateVal.getMonth()+1;var year=dateVal.getFullYear();var formattedDate=year+'-'+(month<10?"0"+month:month)+'-'+(day<10?"0"+day:day);return formattedDate;}return"";}export var getWeekDay=function getWeekDay(string){var _Date$toLocaleString,_Date$toLocaleString$;return(_Date$toLocaleString=new Date(string).toLocaleString('en-us',{weekday:'long'}))===null||_Date$toLocaleString===void 0?void 0:(_Date$toLocaleString$=_Date$toLocaleString.substring(0,3))===null||_Date$toLocaleString$===void 0?void 0:_Date$toLocaleString$.toUpperCase();};export var getYearFromDate=function getYearFromDate(date){if(date){var split=date.split("-");if(split){return split[0];}return"";}return"";};export var getDefaultDate=function getDefaultDate(language){if(language==="nep"){return ADToBS(new Date());}else{return formatDate(new Date());}};
